thread.title: Fresh Heir: Rethinking Age-Based Inheritances

author: wsjcom
title: Fresh Heir: Rethinking Age-Based Inheritances
text:
Amir Mossanen is a wealth adviser at Wells Fargo Private Bank in Beverly Hills, Calif. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. As told to Lynn Shattuck.
Clients often worry about their heirs inheriting their money too soon, fearing a windfall might make their children or grandchildren lose their drive to work and be productive. But what if many beneficiaries are receiving their inheritance too late?
